name: Forrestry Coin-Mission
description:
Jamie is an adventurous guy. He loves searching forests for coins so that he can become richer in life. He must also avoid the enemies that lurk deep within the forest. 

Use the on-screen controls to navigate your way around the forest to collect as many coins and jewels you possibly can in the time limit! 

HOW TO PLAY (also available on main menu in game)

- Collect as many small coins, big coins and jewels as you can in the time limit (120 Seconds). 
- Small Coins are extremely common and worth 2 points. 
- Big coins, which are more rare, are worth 30 points, but usually guarded by an enemy and/or thorns
- Jewels which are extremely rare and worth 75 points, and guarded by an even tougher enemy and more thorns.
- Avoid the tree-lurker enemies (Black Circles) and thorns around the map as they will knock 1 of 5 lives from your total health.
